name: Camayak Content API Shopify
description: A Node.js app for publishing to Shopify from Camayak.

shopifyAPIkey.description: The API key generated by Shopify. Get this from https://myshopify.com/admin/apps/private

shopifyPassword.description: The password for the API key generated by Shopify. Get this from https://myshopify.com/admin/apps/private

shopifyURL.description: The URL to the subdomain of your Shopify site.

shopifyBlogID.description: The ID of the blog that you would like Camayak to connect to. Get this by navigating to https://myshopify.com/admin/blogs/ and clicking the blog you want to use. The ID will be displayed in the URL after /admin/blogs/.

shopifyBlogURL.description: The full URL to the specific blog page on Shopify you would like Camayak to connect to.

camayak_api_key.description: The API key generated by Camayak. Add this after creating the app, as Camayak requires a URL before giving the API key.

camayak_shared_secret.description: A shared secret for signing Camayak requests. (Copy and paste this into Camayak)
